intro.title: Enthusiasm scan
intro.subtitle: Discover what energizes you at work
intro.description: The enthusiasm scan helps you discover what truly energizes you at work. By looking back at moments of joy and enthusiasm, you gain insight into what's important to you.
intro.how_it_works_description: You'll answer questions about three different phases: your high school years, your first job, and your best work experiences. This takes about 15 minutes.

step1.title: Enthusiasm scan - Step 1
step1.subtitle: Questions about your high school years
step1.question1: What did you like to do most during your school time?
step1.question2: Where did you like to spend time most during your school time?
step1.question3: What interested you during your school time? What were you curious about?

step2.title: Enthusiasm scan - Step 2
step2.subtitle: Questions about your first job
step2.question1: What were the most enjoyable tasks in your first job? (this can also be a part-time job)
step2.question2: What working conditions did you enjoy in your first job?
step2.question3: What topics appealed to you in your first job?

step3.title: Enthusiasm scan - Step 3
step3.subtitle: Questions about pleasant work experiences
step3.question1: Describe the most pleasant work period in your career. What made it so enjoyable?
step3.question2: Think of the most enjoyable project you worked on. What was your role in it?
step3.question3: Describe a day when you came home whistling from work. What was so special about that day?

intro.title: Now a completely different topic. You'll need your imagination for this.
intro.instruction_description: Use your imagination and think of three jobs you would like to do (for a while). Think as freely as possible. There are no limitations for now. Below you'll fill in your dream jobs one by one. Answer the questions as if you're already doing that job. You don't need to think about how it exactly works in that job, just describe what appeals to you about it.
intro.instruction_details: Answer each question with 10-20 words, more is also fine. Some questions seem similar. Still answer them all as precisely as possible.
intro.instruction_questions: You'll get a total of eight questions per job.

step1.title: Dream job 1
step1.subtitle: What would you like to do for a while, or even always?
step1.job_title_placeholder: Enter the name of your dream job here...
step1.question1: What do you do in a work week? Answer with verbs and activities.
step1.question2: Where do you do your work? Describe the environment, the building, the space....
step1.question3: Do you work more together or more alone? What kind of people do you have contact with?
step1.question4: What did you do on a day when you come home satisfied?
step1.question5: What is your goal with this work?
step1.question6: Which parts of your work are the most enjoyable?
step1.question7: What is important to you in this work?
step1.question8: What is your work mainly about? What do you need to know a lot about?

step2.title: Dream job 2
step2.subtitle: What would you like to do for a while, or even always?
step2.job_title_placeholder: Enter the name of your dream job here...
step2.question1: What do you do in a work week? Answer with verbs and activities.
step2.question2: Where do you do your work? Describe the environment, the building, the space....
step2.question3: Do you work more together or more alone? What kind of people do you have contact with?
step2.question4: What did you do on a day when you come home satisfied?
step2.question5: What is your goal with this work?
step2.question6: Which parts of your work are the most enjoyable?
step2.question7: What is important to you in this work?
step2.question8: What is your work mainly about? What do you need to know a lot about?

step3.title: Dream job 3
step3.subtitle: What would you like to do for a while, or even always?
step3.job_title_placeholder: Enter the name of your dream job here...
step3.question1: What do you do in a work week? Answer with verbs and activities.
step3.question2: Where do you do your work? Describe the environment, the building, the space....
step3.question3: Do you work more together or more alone? What kind of people do you have contact with?
step3.question4: What did you do on a day when you come home satisfied?
step3.question5: What is your goal with this work?
step3.question6: Which parts of your work are the most enjoyable?
step3.question7: What is important to you in this work?
step3.question8: What is your work mainly about? What do you need to know a lot about?

voltooi.title: Congratulations! ðŸŽ‰
voltooi.subtitle: You have successfully completed the questions about your dream jobs
voltooi.what_happened_description: Keywords have now been compiled to determine what you find important in your work. To generate your personal career report, we need some additional information from you.
voltooi.next_step_description: Complete your personal profile with some extra information about your background and preferences, and indicate what you find important in your work.
voltooi.priorities_description: What do you find important in your work?
voltooi.tip_text: Tip: Completing your personal profile takes about 5-10 minutes.

intro.title: Complete profile
intro.description: We have almost all the information we need for your personal career advice. For the final step, we ask you a few short questions about your background and preferences.
intro.description_details: This helps us make your advice even more specific and practical.

extra_informatie.title: Additional information
extra_informatie.subtitle: Final questions about your background
extra_informatie.question1: What is your highest level of education?
extra_informatie.question2: What professional training have you completed?
extra_informatie.question3: In which organization(s) and/or sectors would you like to work?
extra_informatie.question4: Are there any (physical) limitations we should take into account?
extra_informatie.placeholder1: For example: Bachelor's, Master's, Vocational level 4, etc.
extra_informatie.placeholder2: For example: Business Administration, Psychology, Technical Computer Science, etc.
extra_informatie.placeholder3: For example: IT, Healthcare, government, large multinationals, small start-ups, etc.
extra_informatie.placeholder4: For example: No heavy physical labor, limit screen work, etc. (optional)

activiteiten.title: Priorities - activities
activiteiten.subtitle: Select at least 5 activities that you enjoy doing
activiteiten.missing_keywords: No personal activities have been generated yet. First complete your enthusiasm scan and dream jobs.
activiteiten.extra_text_label: Missing any activities? Add them here (optional)

werkomstandigheden.title: Priorities - working conditions
werkomstandigheden.subtitle: Select at least 5 working conditions that are important to you
werkomstandigheden.missing_keywords: No personal working conditions have been generated yet. First complete your enthusiasm scan and dream jobs.
werkomstandigheden.extra_text_label: Missing any working conditions? Add them here (optional)
werkomstandigheden.extra_text_placeholder: For example: Dog to the office, Good coffee, Ergonomic workplace...

interesses.title: Priorities - interests
interesses.subtitle: Select at least 5 interests that attract you
interesses.missing_keywords: No personal interests have been generated yet. First complete your enthusiasm scan and dream jobs.
interesses.extra_text_label: Missing any interests? Add them here (optional)

intro.title: Create search profile
intro.description: A search profile is your personal document that describes what kind of work you're looking for. It helps you apply for jobs in a targeted way and shows employers what you have to offer.
intro.description_details: Based on your answers, we create a professional search profile that you can use in your job applications or share with recruiters.
intro.already_created_description: You have already created a search profile. You can download it or view it on the download page.

antwoorden.title: Search profile questions
antwoorden.subtitle: Answer the questions to create your search profile
antwoorden.question1: I'm looking for a position as...
antwoorden.question3: I would like to work at...
antwoorden.question6: Working conditions that are important to me...

functie_als: Marketing manager at a tech startup
Teacher at a primary school in London
Accountant at a medium-sized accounting firm
kerntaken: Develop strategy, lead teams, maintain client contact
organisatie_bij: An innovative company with young colleagues and informal atmosphere
A school with engaged parents and motivated students
A renowned firm with professional appearance
gewenste_regio: London and surroundings, max 45 min travel
Manchester city center, preferably cycling distance
Birmingham South, well accessible by public transport
arbeidsvoorwaarden: Â£35,000-45,000 gross, 32-36 hours, remote work possible
Â£30,000-38,000 gross, 40 hours, good pension scheme
Â£40,000-55,000 gross, flexible hours, career opportunities

page1.title: What's next?
page1.intro: Your career report is ready! Now you can start your research, because you want to know more before making a definitive choice.
page1.instruction: Choose two (or more) professions from the analysis of your answers that you want to investigate further.

page2.title: This is your step-by-step plan:
page2.step1: Ask AI (or Google) for a detailed job description of the roles from your career report. Also ask AI for similar roles. What work is comparable? What appeals to you in the answers you get?
page2.step2: Look for job postings that give you an idea of the content of this role and the organizations that have these positions.
page2.step3: Search LinkedIn for people who do this work. What is their background?
page2.step4: Is there a professional association? What do you read on the website about developments in the sector and the profession?
page2.step5: Does the profession have a trade publication? If so, request one or more and read them. What do you notice? Do the topics excite you?

page3.title: Continued step-by-step plan:
page3.step6: Look for organizations where people with this profession work.
page3.step7: What education might you need for this work? Ask AI or Google.
page3.step8: Write down all the questions that come up during your research. You can ask these to people who already work in this direction.
page3.step9: Make a list of people you would like to talk to about this work and approach them. You can find these people through LinkedIn and/or your personal network.
page3.step10: Gather enough information to make a choice. Take your time and talk to others about it.
page3.closing_text: Once you have found out enough, choose the position that fits you best and fill in the search profile on the website. Vinster will convert your text into a few sentences that you can use to let others know what you are looking for. You can now apply in a targeted way! Search for vacancies, let your network know what you want and share on LinkedIn which position you are looking for. We wish you much work satisfaction in your next position!

complete.title: Your search profile is ready!
complete.description: Your search profile contains a summary of your ideal job. Use it in your applications and share it with your network.
complete.next_steps: You can now apply in a targeted way! Search for vacancies, let your network know what you want and share on LinkedIn which position you are looking for.

antwoorden.submit_error: Something went wrong while submitting your search profile.

restart_explanation.title: Restart journey
restart_explanation.subtitle: Do you want to go through the Vinster journey again? Here's how it works.

warning_card.title: Important to know
warning_card.description: When you restart the journey, the following happens:
points: All your current answers will be permanently deleted
Your current report will be removed
Your search profile will be removed
You will pay â‚¬29 again for a new journey
You will start completely fresh from the first step

process_card.title: How does the process work?
process_card.description: The reset process happens in these steps:

steps.title: Payment
steps.description: You will be redirected to the payment page to pay â‚¬29 for the new journey.

steps.title: Delete data
steps.description: After successful payment, all your old answers will be automatically deleted.

steps.title: Start fresh
steps.description: You can restart the journey from the beginning with fresh insights.

buttons.confirm: Yes, I want to start over

errors.general: Something went wrong while starting the reset process.
